info.name: Wikipedia Rotane Dark
info.description:
Modification of https://userstyles.org/styles/99515/wikipedia-1911-rotane . All credit goes to them.

Get it via meta: https://meta.wikimedia.org/wiki/User:Dizzyzane/global.css

Copy it to your own and it should be perfectly functional.
info.additionalInfo:
Fixed an issue with transforms. Please do update!

Switched to transforms for everything I used; beutified it.

Greatly improved performance by using {transform:translate3D(0,0,0)} , which makes the user use its GPU.

Made captions work properly.
